 3/** @file    vsip/core/expr/evaluation.hpp

 8
 9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_EXPR_EVALUATION_HPP
10#define VSIP_CORE_EXPR_EVALUATION_HPP
11
12#include <vsip/core/expr/traversal.hpp>
13
14namespace vsip_csl
15{
16namespace expr
17{
18
19template <typename BlockType> 
20struct Evaluator 
21{
22  static void apply(BlockType const &) {}
23};
24
25template <typename BlockType> 
26struct Evaluator<BlockType const> : Evaluator<BlockType> {};
27
28
29template <template <typename> class Operation, typename Block>
30struct Evaluator<Unary<Operation, Block, false> >
31{
32  typedef Unary<Operation, Block, false> block_type;
33
34  static void apply(block_type const &b) { b.evaluate();}
35};
36
37template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
38	  typename Block0, typename Block1>
39struct Evaluator<Binary<Operation, Block0, Block1, false> >
40{
41  typedef Binary<Operation, Block0, Block1, false> block_type;
42
43  static void apply(block_type const &b) { b.evaluate();}
44};
45
46template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
47	  typename Block0, typename Block1, typename Block2>
48struct Evaluator<Ternary<Operation, Block0, Block1, Block2, false> >
49{
50  typedef Ternary<Operation, Block0, Block1, Block2, false> block_type;
51
52  static void apply(block_type const &b) { b.evaluate();}
53};
54
55template <typename Block>
56void
57evaluate(Block const &block)
58{
59  Traversal<Evaluator, Block>::apply(block);
60}
61
62} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
63} // namespace vsip_csl
64
65#endif // VSIP_CORE_EXPR_EVALUATION_HPP
